Name: Firebolt
Description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.
SpellData: {'Range': '120', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '1d10', 'Scaling': '1d10 per level above 1st'}

Name: Mage Hand
Description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': '1 minute'}

Name: Fireball
Description: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
SpellData: {'Range': '150', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '8d6', 'Area': '20-foot-radius sphere', 'Scaling': '+1d6 per level above 3rd'}

Name: Magic Missile
Description: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4+1 force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.
SpellData: {'Range': '120', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '1d4+1', 'Missiles': '3', 'Scaling': '+1 missile per level above 1st'}

Name: Healing Word
Description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 bonus action', 'Components': 'V', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Healing': '1d4 + modifier', 'Scaling': '+1d4 per level above 1st'}

Name: Shield
Description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self', 'CastingTime': '1 reaction', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': '1 round', 'ACBonus': '5'}

Name: Eldritch Blast
Description: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 force damage.
SpellData: {'Range': '120', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '1d10', 'Scaling': '+1 beam at 5th, 11th, 17th level'}

Name: Sacred Flame
Description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '1d8', 'Scaling': '1d8 per level above 1st'}

Name: Chill Touch
Description: You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the creature. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 necrotic damage, and it can't regain hit points until the start of your next turn.
SpellData: {'Range': '120', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '1d8', 'Scaling': '1d8 per level above 1st'}

Name: Ray of Frost
Description: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes 1d8 cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '1d8', 'Scaling': '1d8 per level above 1st'}

Name: Acid Splash
Description: You hurl a bubble of acid. Choose one creature within range, or choose two creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 acid damage.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '1d6', 'Scaling': '1d6 per level above 1st'}

Name: Vicious Mockery
Description: You unleash a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at a creature you can see within range. If the target can hear you (though it need not understand you), it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 1d4 psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '1d4', 'Scaling': '1d4 per level above 1st'}

Name: Guidance
Description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the ability check. The spell then ends.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': '1 minute', 'Effect': '+1d4 to ability check'}

Name: Light
Description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, M', 'Duration': '1 hour', 'Effect': 'Bright light 20ft, dim light 20ft'}

Name: Minor Illusion
Description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. The illusion also ends if you dismiss it as an action or cast this spell again.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'S, M', 'Duration': '1 minute', 'Effect': 'Sound or image illusion'}

Name: Prestidigitation
Description: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice. You create one of the following magical effects within range.
SpellData: {'Range': '10', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': '1 hour', 'Effect': 'Minor magical effects'}

Name: Thorn Whip
Description: You create a long, vine-like whip covered in thorns that lashes out at your command toward a creature in range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. If the attack hits, the creature takes 1d6 piercing damage, and if the creature is Large or smaller, you pull the creature up to 10 feet closer to you.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '1d6', 'Scaling': '1d6 per level above 1st'}

Name: Cure Wounds
Description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Healing': '1d8 + modifier', 'Scaling': '+1d8 per level above 1st'}

Name: Burning Hands
Description: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self (15-foot cone)', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '3d6', 'Scaling': '+1d6 per level above 1st'}

Name: Charm Person
Description: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range. It must make a Wisdom saving throw, and does so with advantage if you or your companions are fighting it. If it fails the saving throw, it is charmed by you until the spell ends or until you or your companions do anything harmful to it.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': '1 hour', 'Effect': 'Charmed condition'}

Name: Detect Magic
Description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. If you sense magic in this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears magic, and you learn its school of magic, if any.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': '10 minutes', 'Effect': 'Detect magic within 30ft'}

Name: Find Familiar
Description: You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form you choose. The familiar has the statistics of the chosen form, though it is a celestial, fey, or fiend instead of a beast.
SpellData: {'Range': '10 feet', 'CastingTime': '1 hour', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'Summon familiar'}

Name: Mage Armor
Description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends if the target dons armor or if you dismiss the spell as an action.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '8 hours', 'Effect': 'AC becomes 13 + DEX modifier'}

Name: Sleep
Description: This spell sends creatures into a magical slumber. Roll 5d8; the total is how many hit points of creatures this spell can affect. Creatures within 20 feet of a point you choose within range are affected in ascending order of their current hit points.
SpellData: {'Range': '90', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '1 minute', 'Effect': 'Unconscious condition', 'Scaling': '+2d8 per level above 1st'}

Name: Thunderwave
Description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from you must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self (15-foot cube)', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '2d8', 'Scaling': '+1d8 per level above 1st'}

Name: Bless
Description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': '+1d4 to attack rolls and saving throws'}

Name: Guiding Bolt
Description: A flash of light streaks toward a creature of your choice within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 4d6 radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against this target before the end of your next turn has advantage.
SpellData: {'Range': '120', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '4d6', 'Scaling': '+1d6 per level above 1st'}

Name: Inflict Wounds
Description: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 necrotic damage.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '3d10', 'Scaling': '+1d10 per level above 1st'}

Name: Blade Ward
Description: You extend your hand and trace a sigil of warding in the air. Until the end of your next turn, you have resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': '1 round', 'Effect': 'Resistance to weapon damage'}

Name: Dancing Lights
Description: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover in the air for the duration.
SpellData: {'Range': '120', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': 'Create up to 4 lights'}

Name: Druidcraft
Description: Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of the following effects within range.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'Nature-based effects'}

Name: Message
Description: You point your finger toward a creature within range and whisper a message. The target (and only the target) hears the message and can reply in a whisper that only you can hear.
SpellData: {'Range': '120', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '1 round', 'Effect': 'Whisper message'}

Name: Poison Spray
Description: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas from your palm. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.
SpellData: {'Range': '10', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '1d12', 'Scaling': '1d12 per level above 1st'}

Name: Resistance
Description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the saving throw. The spell then ends.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': '+1d4 to saving throw'}

Name: Shocking Grasp
Description: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch. Make a melee spell attack against the target. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 lightning damage, and it can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '1d8', 'Scaling': '1d8 per level above 1st'}

Name: Spare the Dying
Description: You touch a living creature that has 0 hit points. The creature becomes stable. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'Stabilize creature at 0 HP'}

Name: True Strike
Description: You extend your hand and point a finger at a target in range. Your magic grants you a brief insight into the target's defenses. On your next turn, you gain advantage on your first attack roll against the target, provided that this spell hasn't ended.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'S', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 round', 'Effect': 'Advantage on next attack'}

Name: Thaumaturgy
Description: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range. You create one of the following magical effects within range.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V', 'Duration': '1 minute', 'Effect': 'Minor supernatural effects'}

Name: Produce Flame
Description: A flickering flame appears in your hand. The flame remains there for the duration and harms neither you nor your equipment. The flame sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': '10 minutes', 'Damage': '1d8', 'Scaling': '1d8 per level above 1st'}

Name: Mending
Description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as a broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, a torn cloak, or a leaking wineskin. As long as the break or tear is no larger than 1 foot in any dimension, you mend it, leaving no trace of the former damage.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 minute', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'Repair broken object'}

Name: Color Spray
Description: A dazzling array of flashing, colored light springs from your hand. Roll 6d10; the total is how many hit points of creatures this spell can affect. Creatures in a 15-foot cone originating from you are affected in ascending order of their current hit points.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self (15-foot cone)', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '1 round', 'Effect': 'Blinded condition', 'Scaling': '+2d10 per level above 1st'}

Name: Comprehend Languages
Description: For the duration, you understand the literal meaning of any spoken language that you hear. You also understand any written language that you see, but you must be touching the surface on which the words are written. It takes about 1 minute to read one page of text.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '1 hour', 'Effect': 'Understand all languages'}

Name: Disguise Self
Description: You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends or until you use your action to dismiss it. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear thin, fat, or in between.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': '1 hour', 'Effect': 'Change appearance'}

Name: Expeditious Retreat
Description: This spell allows you to move at an incredible pace. When you cast this spell, and then as a bonus action on each of your turns until the spell ends, you can take the Dash action.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self', 'CastingTime': '1 bonus action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 10 minutes', 'Effect': 'Dash as bonus action'}

Name: False Life
Description: Bolstering yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life, you gain 1d4+4 temporary hit points for the duration.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '1 hour', 'Effect': '1d4+4 temporary HP', 'Scaling': '+5 HP per level above 1st'}

Name: Feather Fall
Description: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature's rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If the creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet, and the spell ends for that creature.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 reaction', 'Components': 'V, M', 'Duration': '1 minute', 'Effect': 'No falling damage'}

Name: Fog Cloud
Description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog centered on a point within range. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. It lasts for the duration or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it.
SpellData: {'Range': '120', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 hour', 'Effect': '20ft radius fog', 'Scaling': '+20ft radius per level above 1st'}

Name: Grease
Description: Slick grease covers the ground in a 10-foot square centered on a point within range and turns it into difficult terrain for the duration.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '1 minute', 'Effect': 'Difficult terrain, prone on failed save'}

Name: Identify
Description: You choose one object that you must touch throughout the casting of the spell. If it is a magic item or some other magic-imbued object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires attunement to use, and how many charges it has, if any.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 minute', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'Identify magic item'}

Name: Jump
Description: You touch a creature. The creature's jump distance is tripled until the spell ends.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '1 minute', 'Effect': 'Triple jump distance'}

Name: Longstrider
Description: You touch a creature. The target's speed increases by 10 feet until the spell ends.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '1 hour', 'Effect': '+10 feet speed', 'Scaling': '+1 target per level above 1st'}

Name: Protection from Evil and Good
Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch is protected against certain types of creatures: aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 10 minutes', 'Effect': 'Protection from specific creature types'}

Name: Ray of Sickness
Description: A ray of sickening greenish energy lashes out toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 poison damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it is also poisoned until the end of your next turn.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '2d8', 'Scaling': '+1d8 per level above 1st'}

Name: Sanctuary
Description: You ward a creature within range against attack. Until the spell ends, any creature who targets the warded creature with an attack or a harmful spell must first make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 bonus action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '1 minute', 'Effect': 'Protection from attacks'}

Name: Shield of Faith
Description: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 bonus action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 10 minutes', 'Effect': '+2 AC'}

Name: Silent Image
Description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 15-foot cube. The image appears at a spot within range and lasts for the duration. The image is purely visual; it isn't accompanied by sound, smell, or other sensory effects.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 10 minutes', 'Effect': 'Create visual illusion'}

Name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
Description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range perceives everything as hilariously funny and falls into fits of laughter if this spell affects it. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or fall prone, becoming incapacitated and unable to stand up for the duration.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': 'Incapacitated and prone'}

Name: Tenser's Floating Disk
Description: This spell creates a circular, horizontal plane of force, 3 feet in diameter and 1 inch thick, that floats 3 feet above the ground in an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within range. The disk remains for the duration and can hold up to 500 pounds.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '1 hour', 'Effect': 'Floating disk for storage'}

Name: Unseen Servant
Description: This spell creates an invisible, mindless, shapeless, Medium force that performs simple tasks at your command until the spell ends.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '1 hour', 'Effect': 'Invisible servant'}

Name: Witch Bolt
Description: A beam of crackling, blue energy lances out toward a creature within range, forming a sustained arc of lightning between you and the target. Make a ranged spell attack against that creature. On a hit, the target takes 1d12 lightning damage, and on each of your turns for the duration, you can use your action to deal 1d12 lightning damage to the target automatically.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Damage': '1d12', 'Scaling': '+1d12 per level above 1st'}

Name: Aid
Description: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '8 hours', 'Effect': '+5 HP maximum and current', 'Scaling': '+5 HP per level above 2nd'}

Name: Alter Self
Description: You assume a different form. When you cast the spell, choose one of the following options, the effects of which last for the duration of the spell. While the spell lasts, you can end one option as an action to gain the benefits of a different one.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 hour', 'Effect': 'Change appearance, aquatic adaptation, or natural weapons'}

Name: Blindness/Deafness
Description: You can blind or deafen a foe. Choose one creature that you can see within range to make a Constitution saving throw. If it fails, the target is either blinded or deafened (your choice) for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the spell ends.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V', 'Duration': '1 minute', 'Effect': 'Blinded or deafened condition'}

Name: Blur
Description: Your body becomes blurred, shifting and wavering to all who can see you. For the duration, any creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against you. An attacker is immune to this effect if it doesn't rely on sight, as with blindsight, or can see through illusions, as with truesight.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': 'Disadvantage on attacks against you'}

Name: Cloud of Daggers
Description: You fill the air with spinning daggers in a cube 5 feet on each side, centered on a point you choose within range. A creature takes 4d4 slashing damage when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Damage': '4d4', 'Scaling': '+2d4 per level above 2nd'}

Name: Darkness
Description: Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range to fill a 15-foot-radius sphere for the duration. The darkness spreads around corners. A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 10 minutes', 'Effect': '15ft radius magical darkness'}

Name: Darkvision
Description: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see in the dark. For the duration, that creature has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '8 hours', 'Effect': '60ft darkvision'}

Name: Enhance Ability
Description: You touch a creature and bestow upon it a magical enhancement. Choose one of the following effects; the target gains that effect until the spell ends.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 hour', 'Effect': 'Advantage on ability checks for one ability'}

Name: Enlarge/Reduce
Description: You cause a creature or an object you can see within range to grow larger or smaller for the duration. Choose either a creature or an object that is neither worn nor carried. If the target is unwilling, it can make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell has no effect.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': 'Double or halve size'}

Name: Flaming Sphere
Description: A 5-foot-diameter sphere of fire appears in an unoccupied space of your choice within range and lasts for the duration. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the sphere must make a Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 2d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Damage': '2d6', 'Scaling': '+1d6 per level above 2nd'}

Name: Hold Person
Description: Choose a humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': 'Paralyzed condition', 'Scaling': '+1 target per level above 2nd'}

Name: Invisibility
Description: A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 hour', 'Effect': 'Invisible condition'}

Name: Knock
Description: Choose an object that you can see within range. The object can be a door, a box, a chest, a set of manacles, a padlock, or another object that contains a mundane or magical means that prevents access.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'Unlock or open object'}

Name: Lesser Restoration
Description: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it. The condition can be blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'End disease or condition'}

Name: Levitate
Description: One creature or object of your choice that you can see within range rises vertically, up to 20 feet, and remains suspended there for the duration. The spell can levitate a target that weighs up to 500 pounds. An unwilling creature that succeeds on a Constitution saving throw is unaffected.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 10 minutes', 'Effect': 'Levitate up to 500 pounds'}

Name: Melf's Acid Arrow
Description: A shimmering green arrow streaks toward a target within range and bursts in a spray of acid. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 4d4 acid damage immediately and 2d4 acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss, the arrow splashes the target with acid for half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.
SpellData: {'Range': '90', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '4d4 + 2d4 next turn', 'Scaling': '+1d4 initial and +1d4 next turn per level above 2nd'}

Name: Mirror Image
Description: Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space. Until the spell ends, the duplicates move with you and mimic your actions, shifting position so it's impossible to track which image is real. You can use your action to dismiss the illusory duplicates.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': '1 minute', 'Effect': '3 illusory duplicates'}

Name: Misty Step
Description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self', 'CastingTime': '1 bonus action', 'Components': 'V', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'Teleport 30 feet'}

Name: Phantasmal Force
Description: You craft an illusion that takes root in the mind of a creature that you can see within range. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, you create a phantasmal object, creature, or other visible phenomenon of your choice that is no larger than a 10-foot cube and that is perceivable only to the target for the duration.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': 'Phantasmal illusion'}

Name: Prayer of Healing
Description: Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range each regain hit points equal to 2d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '10 minutes', 'Components': 'V', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Healing': '2d8 + modifier', 'Scaling': '+1d8 per level above 2nd'}

Name: Protection from Poison
Description: You touch a creature. If it is poisoned, you neutralize the poison. If more than one poison afflicts the target, you neutralize one poison that you know is present, or you neutralize one at random.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': '1 hour', 'Effect': 'Neutralize poison'}

Name: Ray of Enfeeblement
Description: A black beam of enervating energy springs from your finger toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength until the spell ends.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': 'Half damage with Strength weapons'}

Name: Scorching Ray
Description: You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range. You can hurl them at one target or several. Make a ranged spell attack for each ray. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 fire damage.
SpellData: {'Range': '120', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '2d6 per ray', 'Rays': '3', 'Scaling': '+1 ray per level above 2nd'}

Name: See Invisibility
Description: For the duration, you see invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible, and you can see into the Ethereal Plane. Ethereal creatures and objects appear ghostly and translucent.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '1 hour', 'Effect': 'See invisible and ethereal'}

Name: Shatter
Description: A sudden loud ringing noise, painfully intense, erupts from a point of your choice within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 3d8 thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '3d8', 'Scaling': '+1d8 per level above 2nd'}

Name: Spider Climb
Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch gains the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving its hands free. The target also gains a climbing speed equal to its walking speed.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 hour', 'Effect': 'Climb on walls and ceilings'}

Name: Suggestion
Description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence a creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you. Creatures that can't be charmed are immune to this effect. The suggestion must be worded in such a manner as to make the course of action sound reasonable.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 8 hours', 'Effect': 'Suggest course of action'}

Name: Web
Description: You conjure a mass of thick, sticky webbing at a point of your choice within range. The webs fill a 20-foot cube from that point for the duration. The webs are difficult terrain and lightly obscure their area.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 hour', 'Effect': '20ft cube of webs, restrained on failed save'}

Name: Zone of Truth
Description: You create a magical zone that guards against deception in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range. Until the spell ends, a creature that enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a creature can't speak a deliberate lie while in the radius.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': '10 minutes', 'Effect': 'Cannot speak deliberate lies'}

Name: Counterspell
Description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, its spell fails and has no effect. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 reaction', 'Components': 'S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'Interrupt spell casting'}

Name: Dispel Magic
Description: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends. For each spell of 4th level or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a successful check, the spell ends.
SpellData: {'Range': '120', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'End spells on target'}

Name: Fly
Description: You touch a willing creature. The target gains a flying speed of 60 feet for the duration. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft, unless it can stop the fall.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 10 minutes', 'Effect': '60ft flying speed', 'Scaling': '+1 target per level above 3rd'}

Name: Haste
Description: Choose a willing creature that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, the target's speed is doubled, it gains a +2 bonus to AC, it has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it gains an additional action on each of its turns.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': 'Double speed, +2 AC, advantage on DEX saves, extra action'}

Name: Lightning Bolt
Description: A stroke of lightning forming a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 8d6 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self (100-foot line)', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '8d6', 'Scaling': '+1d6 per level above 3rd'}

Name: Revivify
Description: You touch a creature that has died within the last minute. That creature returns to life with 1 hit point. This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'Return to life with 1 HP'}

Name: Slow
Description: You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot cube within range. Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by this spell for the duration.
SpellData: {'Range': '120', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': 'Speed halved, -2 AC, -2 DEX saves, can only use action or bonus action'}

Name: Spirit Guardians
Description: You call forth spirits to protect you. They flit around you to a distance of 15 feet for the duration. If you are good or neutral, their spectral form appears angelic or fey (your choice). If you are evil, they appear fiendish.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self (15-foot radius)', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 10 minutes', 'Damage': '3d8', 'Scaling': '+1d8 per level above 3rd'}

Name: Vampiric Touch
Description: The touch of your shadow-wreathed hand can siphon life force from others to heal your wounds. Make a melee spell attack against a creature within your reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d6 necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Damage': '3d6', 'Healing': 'Half damage dealt', 'Scaling': '+1d6 per level above 3rd'}

Name: Banishment
Description: You attempt to send one creature that you can see within range to another plane of existence. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be banished.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': 'Banish to another plane'}

Name: Blight
Description: Necromantic energy washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range, draining moisture and vitality from it. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. The target takes 8d8 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
SpellData: {'Range': '30', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '8d8', 'Scaling': '+1d8 per level above 4th'}

Name: Confusion
Description: This spell assaults and twists creatures' minds, spawning delusions and provoking uncontrolled action. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw when you cast this spell or be affected by it.
SpellData: {'Range': '90', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': 'Confused condition'}

Name: Dimension Door
Description: You teleport yourself from your current location to any other spot within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction.
SpellData: {'Range': '500 feet', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'Teleport 500 feet'}

Name: Freedom of Movement
Description: You touch a willing creature. For the duration, the target's movement is unaffected by difficult terrain, and spells and other magical effects can neither reduce the target's speed nor cause the target to be paralyzed or restrained.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '1 hour', 'Effect': 'Ignore difficult terrain and movement restrictions'}

Name: Greater Invisibility
Description: You or a creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': 'Invisible, does not end on attack or spell'}

Name: Ice Storm
Description: A hail of rock-hard ice pounds to the ground in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range. Each creature in the cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 2d8 bludgeoning damage and 4d6 cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
SpellData: {'Range': '300', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '2d8 bludgeoning + 4d6 cold', 'Scaling': '+1d6 cold per level above 4th'}

Name: Polymorph
Description: This spell transforms a creature that you can see within range into a new form. An unwilling creature must make a Wisdom saving throw to avoid the effect. The spell has no effect on a shapechanger or a creature with 0 hit points.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 hour', 'Effect': 'Transform into beast of CR equal to level or lower'}

Name: Stoneskin
Description: This spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone. Until the spell ends, the target has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 hour', 'Effect': 'Resistance to nonmagical weapon damage'}

Name: Wall of Fire
Description: You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. You can make the wall up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or you can make a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall is opaque and lasts for the duration.
SpellData: {'Range': '120', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Damage': '5d8', 'Scaling': '+1d8 per level above 4th'}

Name: Cone of Cold
Description: A blast of cold air erupts from your hands. Each creature in a 60-foot cone must make a Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 8d8 cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self (60-foot cone)', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '8d8', 'Scaling': '+1d8 per level above 5th'}

Name: Dominate Person
Description: You attempt to beguile a humanoid that you can see within range. It must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for the duration. If you or creatures that are friendly to you are fighting it, it has advantage on the saving throw.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': 'Charmed and controlled'}

Name: Hold Monster
Description: Choose a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. This spell has no effect on undead. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.
SpellData: {'Range': '90', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': 'Paralyzed condition', 'Scaling': '+1 target per level above 5th'}

Name: Mass Cure Wounds
Description: A wave of healing energy flows out from a point of your choice within range. Choose up to six creatures in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Each target regains hit points equal to 3d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Healing': '3d8 + modifier', 'Scaling': '+1d8 per level above 5th'}

Name: Telekinesis
Description: You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought. When you cast the spell, and as your action each round for the duration, you can exert your will on one creature or object that you can see within range, causing the appropriate effect below.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 10 minutes', 'Effect': 'Move or manipulate objects and creatures'}

Name: Teleportation Circle
Description: As you cast the spell, you draw a 10-foot-diameter circle on the ground inscribed with sigils that link your location to a permanent teleportation circle of your choice whose sigil sequence you know and that is on the same plane of existence as you.
SpellData: {'Range': '10 feet', 'CastingTime': '1 minute', 'Components': 'V, M', 'Duration': '1 round', 'Effect': 'Create teleportation circle'}

Name: Wall of Force
Description: An invisible wall of force springs into existence at a point you choose within range. The wall appears in any orientation you choose, as a horizontal or vertical barrier or at an angle. It can be free floating or resting on a solid surface.
SpellData: {'Range': '120', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 10 minutes', 'Effect': 'Invisible wall of force'}

Name: Chain Lightning
Description: You create a bolt of lightning that arcs toward a target of your choice within range. Three bolts then leap from that target to as many as three other targets, each of which must be within 30 feet of the first target. A target can be a creature or an object and can be targeted by only one of the bolts.
SpellData: {'Range': '150', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '10d8', 'Scaling': '+1d8 per level above 6th'}

Name: Disintegrate
Description: A thin green ray springs from your pointing finger toward a target within range that you can see. The target can be a creature, an object, or a creation of magical force, such as the wall created by wall of force.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '10d6 + 40', 'Scaling': '+3d6 per level above 6th'}

Name: Globe of Invulnerability
Description: An immobile, faintly shimmering barrier springs into existence in a 10-foot radius around you and remains for the duration. Any spell of 5th level or lower cast from outside the barrier can't affect anything inside it, even if the spell is cast using a higher level spell slot.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self (10-foot radius)', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Effect': 'Immune to spells 5th level or lower'}

Name: Mass Suggestion
Description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence up to twelve creatures of your choice that you can see within range and that can hear and understand you. Creatures that can't be charmed are immune to this effect. The suggestion must be worded in such a manner as to make the course of action sound reasonable.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, M', 'Duration': '24 hours', 'Effect': 'Suggest course of action to up to 12 creatures'}

Name: True Seeing
Description: This spell gives the willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are. For the duration, the creature has truesight, notices secret doors hidden by magic, and can see into the Ethereal Plane, all out to a range of 120 feet.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': '1 hour', 'Effect': 'Truesight 120ft'}

Name: Finger of Death
Description: You send negative energy coursing through a creature that you can see within range, causing it searing pain. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. It takes 7d8 + 30 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '7d8 + 30', 'Effect': 'Killed humanoid becomes zombie under your control'}

Name: Plane Shift
Description: You and up to eight willing creatures (or a single object that isn't being worn or carried) travel to another plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'Travel to another plane'}

Name: Teleport
Description: This spell instantly transports you and up to eight willing creatures of your choice, or a single object that isn't being worn or carried, to a destination you select. If you target an object, it must be able to fit entirely inside a 10-foot cube, and it can't be held or carried by an unwilling creature.
SpellData: {'Range': '10 feet', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'Teleport anywhere on same plane'}

Name: Antimagic Field
Description: A 10-foot-radius invisible sphere of antimagic surrounds you. This area is divorced from the magical energy that suffuses the multiverse. Within the sphere, spells can't be cast, summoned creatures disappear, and even magic items become mundane.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self (10-foot radius)', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 hour', 'Effect': 'Suppress all magic within 10ft'}

Name: Dominate Monster
Description: You attempt to beguile a creature that you can see within range. It must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for the duration. If you or creatures that are friendly to you are fighting it, it has advantage on the saving throw.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 hour', 'Effect': 'Charmed and controlled'}

Name: Feeblemind
Description: You blast the mind of a creature that you can see within range, attempting to shatter its intellect and personality. The target takes 4d6 psychic damage and must make an Intelligence saving throw.
SpellData: {'Range': '150', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '4d6', 'Effect': 'INT and CHA become 1, can't cast spells'}

Name: Power Word Stun
Description: You speak a word of power that can overwhelm the mind of one creature you can see within range, leaving it dumbfounded. If the target has 150 hit points or fewer, it is stunned. Otherwise, the spell has no effect.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'Stunned if 150 HP or less'}

Name: Wish
Description: Wish is the mightiest spell a mortal creature can cast. By simply speaking aloud, you can alter the very foundations of reality in accord with your desires.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'Alter reality within limits'}

Name: Meteor Swarm
Description: Blazing orbs of fire plummet to the ground at four different points you can see within range. Each creature in a 40-foot-radius sphere centered on each point you choose must make a Dexterity saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes 20d6 fire damage and 20d6 bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
SpellData: {'Range': '1 mile', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Damage': '20d6 fire + 20d6 bludgeoning'}

Name: Power Word Kill
Description: You utter a word of power that can compel one creature you can see within range to die instantly. If the creature you choose has 100 hit points or fewer, it dies. Otherwise, the spell has no effect.
SpellData: {'Range': '60', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'Instant death if 100 HP or less'}

Name: True Resurrection
Description: You touch a creature that has been dead for no longer than 200 years and that didn't die of old age. If the creature's soul is free and willing, the creature is restored to life with all its hit points.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Touch', 'CastingTime': '1 hour', 'Components': 'V, S, M', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': 'Resurrect creature dead up to 200 years'}

Name: Time Stop
Description: You briefly stop the flow of time for everyone but yourself. No time passes for other creatures, while you take 1d4 + 1 turns in a row, during which you can use actions and move as normal.
SpellData: {'Range': 'Self', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V', 'Duration': 'Instantaneous', 'Effect': '1d4+1 turns for you, time stops for others'}

Name: Weird
Description: Drawing on the deepest fears of a group of creatures, you create illusory creatures in their minds, visible only to them. Each creature in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature becomes frightened for the duration. The illusion calls on the creature's deepest fears, manifesting its worst nightmares as an implacable threat. At the end of each of the frightened creature's turns, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 4d10 psychic damage. On a successful save, the spell ends for that creature.
SpellData: {'Range': '120', 'CastingTime': '1 action', 'Components': 'V, S', 'Duration': 'Concentration, up to 1 minute', 'Damage': '4d10 per turn', 'Effect': 'Frightened condition'}
